verses.roman:
eita kahiluṅ sambandha-tattvera vicāra
veda-śāstre upadeśe, kṛṣṇa--eka sāra

synonyms: eita—thus; kahiluṅ—I have described; sambandha-tattvera vicāra—consideration of one's relationship with Kṛṣṇa; veda-śāstre—all Vedic literature; upadeśe—instructs; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; eka sāra—the only essential point.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "I have described one's relation with Kṛṣṇa in various ways. This is the subject matter of all the Vedas. Kṛṣṇa is the center of all activities.
